name: XIndicator
details: A tool where you can build your custom trading indicator and back test it on stocks, cryptos, and NFTs.

name: Handstore
details: A mobile application for talented people to share their handmade products, and for people who are interested in buying great handmade products. In other word, a special place for handmade products.

name: SpiderAlgo
details: The spider has to eat the ant using one of the following algorithms: DFS, BFS, A* and more or you can play as a spider.
